title: Untitled Print
marks:
Inscription

in plate in grey:[ Berghem pinxit
description: landscape; at left foreground figures, male and female, playing musical instruments and dancing; a couple at far left seated on gtound; a man with a bag seated to their right;  above a man playing a flute  and a woman standing; sheep goats and cattle scattered over landscape foreground; large structure on hill at right distance; stream and bridge below
